code: import*as Actions from"./actions";import initialState from"../store/initialState";export const UserReducer=function(){let state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:initialState.user;let action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case Actions.SIGN_UP:return{...state,...action.payload};case Actions.SIGN_IN:return{...state,...action.payload};case Actions.SIGN_OUT:return{...state};default:return state;}};
